quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Actor and Freddy Krueger
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Before he began his acting career, this Rushmore and Spun star was a drummer and songwriter for the band Phantom Plane.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jason Schwartzman

questions.question: Talia Shire is probably best known for playing Adrian Pennino in the awesome Rocky movies. What was her characters name in the Godfather movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Connie Corleone

questions.question: In the hit comedy Napoleon Dynamite, Napoleon is a member of the Happy Hands Club, a sign language troupe. What was the name of the song they performed in class?

options.text: Id Like to Teach the World to Sing

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Rose

questions.question: In the film Freddy vs. Jason, Freddy Krueger wins the battle of slasher movie icons.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This American-born actors father was a French diplomat with the United Nations, so he grew up in Geneva, Switzerland, then moved to France at 16. He is most famous for his role as Connor MacLeod.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christopher Lambert

questions.question: In 1998 Ving Rhames won a Golden Globe for best actor for his portrayal of Don King in HBOs Don King: Only in America. During his acceptance, Rhames gave his award to this fellow nominee and veteran actor, stating, I feel that being an artist is about giving, and Id like to give this to you.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Lemmon

questions.question: Freddy Kruegers mother was a nun.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was Freddys daughters first name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kathryn

questions.question: What 1989 Christmas movie has the tagline, They lost the true spirit of Christmas...And found it locked in the heart of one little girl.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prancer

questions.question: This Diner actor has turned down lead roles in Pulp Fiction, 48 Hrs, The Untouchables, Platoon, and Beverly Hills Cop.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mickey Rourke

questions.question: When Freddy Krueger made a deal with the Dream Demon and ended his mortal life. What was his mortal body buried in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The trunk of a car

questions.question: This Harvard graduate and Oscar winner for Mister Roberts played the piano, the harmonica and the bass fiddle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Lemmon

questions.question: The 1979 movie sequel, written and directed by Sylvester Stallone, grossed $200,000,000 USD.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rocky II

questions.question: John Travolta played Vincent Vega in Pulp Fiction, but Tarantino wanted to cast another actor in the role.  This actor turned down the part in order to appear in Wyatt Earp. Who is the actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Madsen

questions.question: According to Wizard magazine, where did Freddy Krueger rate on the list of all time greatest movie villains?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 14th

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Journey
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, peak, drama. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What does Pedro give to Summer to convince her to go to the dance with him in the movie Napoleon Dynamite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a cake

questions.question: In the movie Napoleon Dynamite, when Napoleon decides that he needs a job, where does he end up working and how much money did he get on his first day?

options.text: Debs photo studio--20 dollars and a kiss

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a chicken farm---6 dollars

questions.question: How do Napoleon and Trisha get to the school dance in the comedy movie Napoleon Dynamite?

options.text: Pedros cousins drive them in their low-rider.
Trishas mom take them there in their van.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pedros cousins drive them in their low-rider.

questions.question: In Journey to the Center of the Earth, the person who leads the expedition to the Earths core is honoured with what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Knighthood

questions.question: In the comedy classic Napoleon Dynamite, what was the name of Napoleons high school?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Preston High

questions.question: In the movie Napoleon Dynamite, what was the name of the farmer who shot the cow and lives across from Napoleon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lyle

questions.question: Who is the Drama Club teacher, portrayed by Alyson Reed in the movie High School Musical?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ms. Darbus

questions.question: What kind of machine does Kip hook Napoleon up to in the comedy hit movie Napoleon Dynamite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: time machine

questions.question: What is Napoleons favorite animal to draw from the comedy hit Napoleon Dynamite?

options.text: a liger (a lion and tiger mix )

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a liger (a lion and tiger mix )

questions.question: Name the mountain peak near the volcano Snaeffelsyokull where the journey in Journey to the Center of the Earth begins.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Skartaris Peak

questions.question: In the hit movie Napoleon Dynamite, what does Napoleon give to Trisha to convince her to go to the dance with him?

options.text: a portrait of her that he drew
a picture of a liger that he drew

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a portrait of her that he drew

questions.question: Rick Moranis and Steve Martin or Jack Nicholson and Jonathan Haze in a flower store.

options.text: On A Clear Day, You Can See Forever

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Shop of Horrors

questions.question: In Journey to the Center of the Earth guide Hans Belke has what kind of pet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Duck

questions.question: From whose novel was the motion picture Journey to the Center of the Earth adapted?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jules Vernes

questions.question: In the movie Journey to the Center of the Earth, who leads the daring quest to the Earths core?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oliver S.  Lindenbrook

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Movie and Journey
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, john, rickman. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who is the terrorists technology expert in Die Hard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Theo

questions.question: What do the terrorists want in the action film Die Hard?

options.text: To kill as many people as possible

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bearer bonds

questions.question: In the movie Die Hard, throughout his ordeal in the building, McClane stays in radio contact with which LAPD Sgt.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Powell

questions.question: What is the name of the building in which the movie Die Hard is set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nakatomi Plaza

questions.question: At the movies end, who falls off the altar stone of the Lost City of Atlantis into a tree?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alec (Alexander) McEwen

questions.question: Who stars as NYPD police officer John McClane in the hit movie Die Hard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bruce Willis

questions.question: In what year did the movie Die Hard come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1988

questions.question: Which of these couples is wed at the end of the movie Journey to the Center of the Earth?

options.text: Oliver S. Lindenbrook and Claire Burke
The Laird of Glendarach and  Rose Weir

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alec McEwen and Jenny

questions.question: How does McClane, the protagonist of Die Hard, kill the terrorist, named Karl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He doesnt

questions.question: What was the name of the main terrorist played by Alan Rickman in Die Hard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hans Gruber

questions.question: Where and when does the story in the movie Journey to the Center of the Earth begin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edinburgh, Scotland, 1880

questions.question: What prehistoric creatures threaten the only woman taking part in the expedition in the movie Journey to the Center of the Earth?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prehistoric reptiles

questions.question: Name the only woman taking part in the journey in the movie Journey to the Center of the Earth.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carla

questions.question: In the movie Die Hard, after detective McClane gets out, a newspaper reporter tries to interview him. Who punches the reporter in the face?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: McLanes wife

questions.question: What foe does the expedition in Journey to the Center of the Earth face along the way?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Count Saknussen

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: View and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, villains, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What famous landmark is featured in the beginning of the movie A View to a Kill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Eiffel Tower in Paris

questions.question: This character, who becomes a psychopath as a result of a genetic experiment, is the villain in A View to a Kill.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Max Zorin

questions.question: In what car does James Bond chase the villains henchwoman in A View to a Kill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mercedes

questions.question: Who directed the 1985 movie A View to a Kill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Glen

questions.question: What did Andy say was pretty gross in the movie The Breakfast Club?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Claire dehydrating

questions.question: On what date did the 5 characters in the movie Breakfast Club have to sacrifice a whole day in detention?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saturday, March 24, 1984

questions.question: In the opening credits of the movie The Breakfast Club, the Man of the Year plaque was shown. Whose picture was on it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carl the Janitor

questions.question: What is the title of the fourth installment in the Die Hard series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Live Free or Die Hard

questions.question: In the opening credits of The Breakfast Club, the guidance counselors desk is shown with his nameplate. What is the name and what is the significance?

options.text: R. Hashimoto, executive producer of the film
P. Gleason, actor in the film
J. Hughes, director of the film
R. Reagan, president of the US

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: R. Hashimoto, executive producer of the film

questions.question: What is the alias James Bond uses in A View to a Kill, when he is at the villains French chateau in Chantilly?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saint John Smythe

questions.question: Who is James Bonds female ally, in A View to a Kill, who helps him discover the villain’s real purpose?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stacey Sutton

questions.question: Who is the villains henchwoman in A View to a Kill, who dies after switching sides?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: May Day

questions.question: What kind of lunch meat did Allison fling onto the statue in The Breakfast Club, before making her Capn Crunch and pixy stick sandwich?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: pimiento loaf

questions.question: At what famous landmark does James Bond kill the villain in A View to a Kill?

options.text: The San Francisco Golden Gate Bridge
The Statue of Christ in Rio de Janeiro
The Pyramid of Cheops in Egypt

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The San Francisco Golden Gate Bridge

questions.question: Which famous British group performs the title song in A View to a Kill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Duran Duran

questions.question: Who stars as Chris Gardner in the movie The Pursuit of Happyness?

questions.question: Who played Chris Gardners son in the drama film The Pursuit of Happyness?

questions.question: Earl Holliman starred in a weekly western series titled Hotel de Paree.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Happyness and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: At the beginning of the film The Pursuit of Happyness, what does Chris do for a living?

options.text: He sells Metalife door to door.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He sells bone density scanners.

questions.question: This film, directed by Robert Flaherty, is considered to be the first documentary film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nanook of the North

questions.question: Why is the word happiness misspelled in the title of the 2006 movie The Pursuit of Happyness ?

options.text: This is the way Chris wrote it on his sons wall.
This is the way Chris son spells it.
This is the way Chris wife spelled it in a letter.
It is written that way on the wall of the daycare center.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is written that way on the wall of the daycare center.

questions.question: Homeless people in the film The Pursuit of Happyness were played by actual homeless people.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What breed was the first canine movie star, Rin Tin Tin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: German Shepherd

questions.question: At what firm does Chris get an internship in the drama movie The Pursuit of Happyness?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dean Witter

questions.question: What is the name of Charlie Chaplins first feature-length film, also directed by him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Kid

questions.question: All of these movies but one, star Wallace Reid, considered to be one of the most attractive actors of the silent era.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Racing Hearts

questions.question: In the movie The Pursuit of Happyness, Alan Frakesh, the man who trained Chris, was played by what famous voice actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Castellaneta

questions.question: In 2006 Chris Gardner started working for what firm?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No firm

questions.question: In 1921 George Melfords The Sheik debuted and established this star as the cinemas best known lover.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rudolph Valentino

questions.question: Early in the movie The Pursuit of Happyness a woman steals something important from Chris. Who portrays this woman?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in the San Francisco area

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thandie Newton
